column6: "AUTHORITATIVE ACTION" pts. 4 & 5 (of 6) What inner demons are driving Reed Richards to the brink - and can the FF overcome them before the bombs start to rain down on Latveria? 32 PGS. (each)/MARVEL PSR...$2.25 (each)
column8: | penciller (cover):Tony Harris | penciller:Howard Porter | inker:Norm Rapmund | writer:Mark Waid
